downloadTitle: Viva Glint DIY Insights Review Template
downloadDescription: Template for Viva Glint admins to use when doing an Insight Review at their organization.
detailsSection: This document is for Viva Glint customers to use in their organizations when presenting survey data. As seen in the template, we suggest the presentation is a short, focused story and will lead to a discussion about action taking and next steps.
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file, or find the file on your device and open it.
